name: Little Alchemist (itch)
description:
Little Alchemist is a short puzzle-crafting game where help your clients that come to your medieval alchemy shop by crafting the right potions.

This game was created for participate on the Spain Game Devs Jam III.

The assets used on this game are downloaded from Unity Asset Store and the sounds from FreeSound.org.

Controls:

  • Mouse Click and drag and drop items.
